dict.string: We need camera access to let you take photos for your symptom logs.
We use contacts to help you share your health data with your healthcare providers.
We use HealthKit to help you track your symptoms and health data in one place.
We use HealthKit to save your symptom and health tracking data.
We use your location to help track environmental factors that may affect your symptoms.
We need access to your photo library to allow you to add photos to your symptom logs.
We use reminders to help you remember to log your symptoms and take medications.
We use this information to improve your app experience and provide personalized insights.
